author: Kevin O'Sullivan
title: Trinity to set up Covid-19 research centre
description: Hub will be led by college immunologists and infectious disease clinicians from St James’s Hospital
content:
Trinity College Dublin is to set up a Covid-19 research hub that will focus on the most urgent scientific breakthroughs needed to address the current pandemic including design of new drugs and a vaccine to combat the virus.
The hub will work with doctors fro… [+3460 chars]
